entry.title: Making Chocolate Cake
entry.summary: Who doesn't like chocolate cake? This is an easy to read rhyming recipe for chocolate cake perfect for early readers.

entry.title: A Day At School
entry.summary: This is an easy to read, 500 word, short story, about Kim's day at school. It is suitable for kids, who can read simple sentences and are ready to start reading short stories on their own.

entry.title: The Dog Named Bob
entry.summary: This is an easy to read poem about two kids and their dog named Bob. The poem has mainly 3 and 4 letter words and a few 5 letter words. The pictures provide context to help the child figure out the words. The rhyme and rhythm make it an entertaining read. You are welcome to print this out for personal use.

entry.title: I Love Sam
entry.summary: This is a simple book of mainly 3 and 4 letter words, about a girl's interactions with her doll, Sam. It contains a few sentences with many of the words repeated several times. The pictures provide context and help the child figure out the words. It is a perfect book for your child to start reading, with your help. You are welcome to print this out for personal use.
